DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate safety effectiveness NNR06 Multi-Purpose Solution clean disinfect solution ( Test ) compare COMPLETE Multi-Purpose Solution clean disinfect solution ( Control ) use habitual contact lens wearer bilaterally clean disinfect contact lenses approximately three month .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety Effectiveness Study New Contact Lens Cleaning Disinfecting Solution
DOC.detailed_description: Approximately 398 subject ( 796 eye ) enrol three-month control , parallel group , mask , randomize study approximately 22 investigative site United States ( US ) . Approximately one-half subject randomize receive Bausch & Lomb investigational NNR06 Multi-Purpose Solution use rub care regimen ( Test ) , approximately one-half subject randomize receive COMPLETE Multi-Purpose Solution rub care regimen ( Control ) .
DOC.criteria: Is habitual wearer one follow lens type : Lens Group Lens Material Trade Name Manufacturer 4 Etafilcon A Acuvue2 Vistakon 5A Balafilcon A PureVision2 Bausch + Lomb 5C Samfilcon A Ultra Bausch + Lomb 5Cm Lotrafilcon B Optix Aqua Alcon 5Cr Senofilcon A Oasys Vistakon Is correctable spherocylindrical refraction 32 letter ( 0.3 logMAR ) good ( distance , high contrast ) eye soft spherical contact lens . Has clear central cornea free anterior segment disorder . Is habitual user lens care product cleaning , disinfect , storage lens . Requires lens correction eye . Wears manufacturer brand lens eye . Agrees wear study lens daily wear basis approximately three month . Is willing able comply treatment followup/study procedure .
